page.title: 11EVENTS VILLAGE GREEN
page.content: On the village green we have just had a school sports day and the day before that we had a rounders match with the Young Farmers.The Young Farmers come every week in the summer to play rounders or cricket. Every year on a Saturday in July we have a sports day for all the village. Some times the school children have PE on the green. Across the track from the green are the swings and the seesaw. This year the village raised enough money to buy a new slide. Every year the church holds an "It's a Knock Out".It was opened by the Rector on July 22nd. Sawley was one of eight teams taking part. This year on Bank holiday Monday we had a barbeque for the first time which was to raise money for a new village Hall.Tourists often stop for a rest and have a picnic in summer.
